start.desc: You are standing in a field. There is a goat path to the north.

goatPath.desc: You find yourself on a goat path. There is an easy, slow path to the east, and a dangerous path heading down a cliff side to the west.

actions.message: You and Billy carefully make your down the steep cliff path.

choice.message: You attempt to make your way down the path, slipping and falling to your death. A goat you are not.

actions.message: You find the nearest goat and carefully make your way down the cliff. You find out the goat's name is Billy. Billy has now joined your party.
Why would you need another goat?

coast1.desc: You arrive at the coast line. You can travel east or west along the coast, or north back up the cliff.

endlessCoast.desc: You arrive at more coast line. You can travel east or west along the coast. It is all starting to look the same.

coast2.desc: You arrive at the coast line. You can travel east or west along the coast. It seems to be getting a little more rocky.

outsideCave.desc: The coast line ends at the mouth of a cave with long jagged outcroppings along the mouth of the cave.

actions.message: You follow Billy into the cave in search of your valued garbage disposal.
Upon entering the cave, the ground shakes as the teeth of the cave close behind you.

choice.message: Are you crazy? How do you know it is safe? The cave's 'mouth' looks like it has teeth.

actions.message: You have no further goats to sacrifice to appease the cave monster.
Billy disappears into the mouth of the cave, and doesn't come out. There goes your garbage disposal.

caveEnterance.desc: You are at the enterance of the cave. With what little light that is available, you can see a pile of bones to the west, and a slightly flooded section to the west.
